Text.Page:
The mandrills are wreaking havoc on our camp, tearing down scaffolding, moving objects around, and otherwise making it impossible to perform proper archaeology here in {@Rgn:30001$$Balder's Refuge}.

Wipe out the {@LinkCreature:30#510#direpaw} and {@LinkCreature:30#520#dreadpaw mandrills}.

See Leiria for some post-slaughter compensation.

Yep. That's a lot of dead mandrills.

Now wash that blood off.
Kill those mandrills before they tear our camp apart!
